text: Oman Avenues Mall is one of the largest shopping mall in Oman. It is a division of renowned LuLu Group International based at Abu Dhabi. It was inaugurated in May 2015, under the patronage of M.A Yusuff Ali, MD, Lulu Group, along with other key members of the Lulu management. ==References== == External links == * Category:Shopping malls in Oman
title: Oman Avenues Mall
